adjective.description: Relating to or denoting an imagined state or society where there is great suffering or injustice.
examples: the dystopian future of a society bereft of reason
the utopian dream that became a dystopian nightmare

noun.description: A person who imagines or foresees a state or society where there is great suffering or injustice.
examples: a lot of things those dystopians feared did not come true
